verbs.description: [ARG0: The BBC] [V: reports] [ARG1: that Michael Cohen was paid at least $ 400,000 by Ukraine for a meeting with Donald Trump after he took office] .
The BBC reports that Michael Cohen [V: was] paid at least $ 400,000 by Ukraine for a meeting with Donald Trump after he took office .
The BBC reports that [ARG2: Michael Cohen] was [V: paid] [ARG1: at least $ 400,000] [ARG0: by Ukraine] [ARG3: for a meeting with Donald Trump after he took office] .
The BBC reports that Michael Cohen was paid at least $ 400,000 by Ukraine for a meeting with Donald Trump after [ARG0: he] [V: took] [ARG1: office] .
